pma:database.name: library
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `menu` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `category_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `title` varchar(200) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 DEFAULT NULL, `thumbnail` varchar(200) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 DEFAULT NULL, `note` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 DEFAULT NULL, `description` varchar(400) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 DEFAULT NULL, `href_param` varchar(300) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `FK_category_famous` (`category_id`), CONSTRAINT `FK_category_famous` FOREIGN KEY (`category_id`) REFERENCES `category` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=38 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

table.name: menu
table.column: At New Jersey amusement park, vintage ride turns 80

This article originally appeared on USA Today KEANSBURG, N.J. — One milestone birthday to celebrate as Keansburg Amusement Park opens in full this weekend: Its kiddie “pedal” cars turn 80. The seven vintage cars, painted yellow and green, have been carrying children around and around since the 1930s. “It’s one of a kind, really,” marketing director Katie […]

table.name: menu
table.column: Keansburg Amusement Parks Opens for Season Saturday

This article originally appeared on Patch.com By Carly Baldwin, (Patch Staff) KEANSBURG, N.J. — Keansburg Amusement Park will officially open for the season Palm Sunday weekend, April 8 and 9, the park has confirmed. The amusement park will be open all spring break at 12 noon through Monday, April 17 (weather permitting). And the mermaids will […]

table.name: menu
table.column: Iconic Restaurant Finally Reopens After Sandy

This article originally appeared on Asbury Park Press Three years ago this fall, a now infamous storm came calling. It blew across our beaches, ripped apart our hometowns and then retreated, taking with it much of what we love about life at the Shore. Earlier this month, we got a piece of that old life […]

table.name: menu
table.column: All You Need to Know About Summer at the Shore

This article originally appeared on Asbury Park Press Boardwalk & Dining Time for lunch: If you're looking for something a little different, head to Shish Kabob Gourmet for shish kabobs and corn on the cob, both of which are grilled to order. There's also Cheesy's Pizza and Dylan's Walk-in Tacos and Hot Dogs; at the […]

table.name: menu
table.column: Pizza V Voted #2 by APP.com Summer Food Series

This article originally appeared on Asbury Park Press WHY VISIT: "We have people that come from Florida to get the pizza because they grew up here and love our pizza," said James Carusotto, whose father, Anthony, owns Pizza V. The pizzeria has been on the boardwalk for nearly 50 years. "I was making pizza (on […]

table.name: menu
table.column: Keansburg Amusement Park ready to open

This article originally appeared on NJ.com KEANSBURG - The Keansburg Amusement Park is set to open this weekend for the 2015 season. Several new attractions and rides have been restored. Park owner William Gelhaus says it's a great place to celebrate the nicer weather. "We're expecting great things. This is the first weekend after a […]

table.name: menu
table.column: Jerry’s Jobs: Working at Keansburg Amusement Park

This article originally appeared on Asbury Park Press. KEANSBURG – My hand is hovering over the button. I am waiting for the signal, a thumbs up, from my colleague in the lookout tower. I'm about to send two teenage girls hurtling 10 stories skyward at a speed of 35 miles an hour. This is the […]

table.name: menu
table.column: Founded in 1904, Keansburg Amusement Park still charms

This article originally appeared on Asbury Park Press In 1904, William Gehlhaus convinced five investors to join him in purchasing an area of marshland overlooking Raritan Bay, in hopes of creating a resort area. It was a bold move, especially because Gehlhaus was a baker from Atlantic Highlands, with no experience in real estate development. […]

table.name: menu
table.column: “A treasure of an amusement park in New Jersey. Waterpark and rides at a great price, never crowded and it has an old soul feeling about it. Every time we go to Keansburg we always have an awesome time and many fun memories. I wouldn’t go anywhere else.” Evelyn Lopes Delgado “A great place to […]

table.name: menu
table.column: Construction begins on new Keansburg roller coaster to replace the ‘Wild Cat’ that was destroyed by Sandy

This article originally appeared on New Jersey 12 KEANSBURG - Construction has begun on a new ride at Keansburg Amusement Park to replace the "Wild Cat" coaster mangled by the superstorm. The foundation is down for the new roller coaster, and parts of it have also arrived. It will have a loop taking passengers upside […]

table.name: menu
table.column: Sandy-ravaged Keansburg Amusement Park ready for Easter after exhausting repairs

This article originally appeared on New Jersey 12 Pattie Cappuccio never doubted it. Not even the day after the storm, when her game booths at Keansburg Amusement Park were covered in knee-deep sand, left behind by chest-high flood waters. "I knew Bill and Hank (Gehlhaus) would get us open. I really did," she said, as […]

table.name: menu
table.column: Keansburg Amusement Park vows to rebuild after Hurricane Sandy destruction

This article originally appeared on NJ.com KEANSBURG — Just days after getting battered by Hurricane Sandy, the co-owner of the Keansburg Amusement Park and Runaway Rapids Waterpark has already set a reopening date: April 8, 2013. That gives the Gehlhaus Family and its crew five months five months to clear out several feet of sand […]

table.name: menu
table.column: Celebrate America’s Birthday with FIREWORKS. Keansburg Amusement Park & Runaway Rapids will light up Friday July 1st with our BIGGEST show ever! Spend the day at Keansburg Amusement Park & Runaway Rapids and cap it off with one of the most beautiful fireworks display on the Jersey Shore! Free entry!

table.name: menu
table.column:
Family fun Jeep & Truck Show
REGISTRATION IS OPEN!!
June 18 2022
2pm to 6pm
Space is Limited 250 Street spots Available
Parking lot parking available for spectators as well.
PayPal confirmation must be on registration form!

table.name: menu
table.column: Just fifteen minutes away for our park, Blue Bay Inn is a charming boutique hotel in Atlantic Highlands. It's the perfect place to stay to enjoy all the pleasures of nearby Manhattan and The Jersey Shore at an affordable rate! Located close to the waterfront, guests are just footsteps from the shore where they can take in stunning views of the Manhattan skyline.

51 First Avenue
Atlantic Highlands, NJ, 07716
732.708.9600
info@bluebayinn.com

table.name: menu
table.column: This gem of a hotel in Middletown is a short drive away from the park. The Quality Inn, is your ideal hotel when visiting the Jersey Shore and the Downtown Red Bank area. All the expected traveler amenities are available to you, including their complimentary hot breakfast, served daily.

750 State Route 35 South
Middletown, NJ, 07748
732.671.3400
gm.nj187@choicehotels.com

table.name: menu
table.column: The holiday Inn is just a ten minute drive from our amusement park. With affordable prices and great amenities, you can't beat staying here. Plus kids stay and eat free!

table.name: menu
table.column: Nickerson’s Ice cream has been serving freshly made hard ice cream since 1946 . Choose a cone, sundae,milkshake, or our crowd favorite; a famous waffle and ice cream sandwich! The combinations are endless with toppings like hot fudge, caramel, sprinkles, and more!

table.name: menu
table.column: Cheesy’s Pizza: OPEN UNDER NEW OWNERSHIP 2021
Craving some traditional boardwalk pizza? Cheesy’s is the place for you! Toppings include pepperoni, sausage, peppers, onions, and more! Traditional, Sicilian, or garlic knots! Yum!

table.name: menu
table.column: Funnel cake & fun traditional Jersey Shore boardwalk food!

table.name: menu
table.column: Our original Fresh Grilled 1/4lb. Pork & Chicken Kabobs were established here in the park in 1997. Also serving traditional Sabrett Hotdogs and other boardwalk favorites.

table.name: menu
table.column: Not your traditional scoop, Dippin Dots is the cool way to enjoy an old favorite. Enjoy several unique flavors of this delicious dot delicacy!

table.name: menu
table.column: Enjoy a boardwalk favorite! Traditional Soft Served Ice Cream! Top off your treat with one of our several delicious toppings or order a Sundae, Thick-Shake, Slushie or Frozen Yogurt!

table.name: menu
table.column: A boardwalk tradition, Pizza V serves classic thin crust Jersey pizza!

table.name: menu
table.column: This open air eatery has all of your classic boardwalk favorites from sausage sandwiches and cheesesteaks to hamburgers and hotdogs. You can find something for everyone! And don’t forget to add some delicious cheese fries to your order.

table.name: menu
table.column: A cool treat on a hot summer day, Snowie shaved ice comes in fun flavors to go!

table.name: menu
table.column: Serving up the best seafood, the Miami Club offers a raw bar, seafood, burgers and the best homemade clam chowder in the Bayshore. Stop in for a Sugar Island rum bucket or our twist on the traditional Rum & Coke, an Island & Coke. The Miami Club offers a clean friendly sit-down atmosphere to order up food and drinks.

table.name: menu
table.column: Established in 1934, enjoy one of Keansburg Amusement Park's oldest eateries! Famed hot dogs are again available along with German beer!

table.name: menu
table.column: Delicious boardwalk snacks to eat on the go!

table.name: menu
table.column: Classic boardwalk hand cut fries served with vinegar. A Keansburg Amusement Park boardwalk tradition!

table.name: menu
table.column:
Mambo Nando's Puerto Rican American cuisine- NEW 2021. View their menu here:mambonandos_menu_v5
Click here to visit their website:mambonandos.com

table.name: menu
table.column: The absolute best zeppole on the Jersey Shore! Freshly made daily.

table.name: menu
table.column: Serving Cotton Candy, Fresh Lemonade, Churros, Pretzels and Refreshments!

table.name: menu
table.column: Boardwalk Grill at the Pavilion Bar
New venue, Boardwalk Grill at the Pavilion Bar, will serve up delicious gyros and more!

table.name: menu
table.column: Flavor Burst offers a variety of premium flavors from which to choose. The intrigue will capture your attention and the flavor that will bring you back for more.
